ygData.subject: Re: Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry, i didn t know that.  i will put spoiler in the subject from now on and not put any spoiler space, ok? Shada
ygData.messageBody:
sorry, i didn't know that. i will put spoiler in the subject from now on
and not put any spoiler space, ok?

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 12:29 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or
> feature?
>
>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> >what is it with people just writing messages that say
> >Spoiler...
> >There is nothing to scroll down to after that so why even
> send themail?
> >seems kind of pointless to me eh?
>
>
> heh, some of us got it, but some mailers interpret a period
> on a line by itself to be the end of the
> message. Sloppy parsing but there you are.
>
> Tszaaz
>
